title: Marketing Intern
content:
At NICE, we don’t limit our challenges. We challenge our limits. Constantly. We’re relentless. We’re ambitious. And we make an impact. Our NICErs bring their A game and spend each day turning it into an A+. And if you’re like us, we can offer you the kind of challenge that will light a fire within you.INTERNSHIP – MARKETING - SG
We are currently offering an internship in our SG Marketing Department here at NICE, which will provide you with the opportunity to gain insights into the daily work of integrated marketing management. As the SG marketing intern, you will collaborates with the APAC marketing team in all stages of marketing campaigns and will help develop, expand and maintain partner marketing channels. You will have a good understanding of the latest marketing trends and techniques. You will be enthusiastic with excellent communication skills.
About the role
Are you a student looking to get work experience in the marketing field within an IT B2B environment?
We are currently offering a full-time internship in our Marketing team here at NICE, which will provide you with the opportunity to gain insights into the daily work of marketing management.
You will help drive collaboration, get involved in planning and execution amongst all marketing activities. This is a fantastic opportunity to work across every area of the marketing business and help deliver the strategic vision for the region. You will have exposure to the APAC marketing team and assist to roll out global campaigns in the region. You will offer event support and coordination for tradeshows, webinars and executive roundtables
Responsibilities and dutiesAs a Marketing Intern at NICE, you will:

Support the marketing team with daily administrative tasks (event organization, salesforce updates, lead follow up);
Liaise with our PR and marketing agency
Assist with marketing and advertising promotional activities
Help organize SEAGC (South East Asia and Greater China) marketing events for our prospects and clients (e.g. researching locations);
Support product marketing activities (e.g. localising global campaigns, preparing and proof-reading external communications).
Support with APAC webinars (e.g. preparing invites, post-webinar emails, scheduling of social media post, PPT decks and the platform)
Assist in the marketing campaign planning and execution.
Support in performance reporting for each campaign.
Support the development of the content tracker

Qualification and skills

You are a University student; the internship is a compulsory part of your course of studies
Availability for 6-12 months starting in Jan 2024
A highly motivated, collaborative team player
Capable of managing multiple projects and priorities in a dynamic environment
Excellent written and verbal communication skills
Strong interest in technology and B2B marketing

What can you expect?

You can be a part of building the NICE brand and create awareness in APAC;
You will have the opportunity to be creative and think outside the box;
You will get to work in a fast-paced, challenging and professional environment with the best minds from the tech industry;
Challenging position at the global leader of Contact Centre solutions.

#LI-Hybrid About NICE 
NICE Ltd. (NASDAQ: NICE) software products are used by 25,000+ global businesses, including 85 of the Fortune 100 corporations, to deliver extraordinary customer experiences, fight financial crime and ensure public safety. Every day, NICE software manages more than 120 million customer interactions and monitors 3+ billion financial transactions. 
Known as an innovation powerhouse that excels in AI, cloud and digital, NICE is consistently recognized as the market leader in its domains, with over 8,500 employees across 30+ countries. 
NICE is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, national origin, age, sex, marital status, ancestry, neurotype, physical or mental disability, veteran status, gender identity, sexual orientation or any other category protected by law.
